name: Alien Escape - Final Arcade
description:
The green, two-legged Alien Griz has been abducted from his home planet of Miz by a group of evil scientists who wish to experiment on him. You must help Griz find his way through the Lab that he is being held in and get him the green juice that is his life force in order for him to escape. 

First, you must help Griz find his way between the tricky platforms by using the arrow keys. There are six green juice pickups to collect along the way. Make sure to avoid the guards that are patrolling the facility, and don't fall!

Next, you must lead Griz through the complex underground tunnel system of the lab by using the arrow keys to navigate through the tight tunnels. There are six more green juices hidden in rooms protected by heavy metal doors, but be careful to avoid the security guards roaming the halls and the booby traps! You must use the mouse to aim and shoot Griz's radioactive goo to break through the doors and take down the guards!
